1.1.msg: Active <area> elements must have alternate text
Image buttons must have alternate text
svg elements with an img role have an alternative text

1.2.msg: Active <area> elements must have alternate text
Image buttons must have alternate text
svg elements with an img role have an alternative text

2.1.msg: Frames must have an accessible name

3.2.msg: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

5.7.msg: All cells in a table element that use the headers attribute must only refer to other cells of that same table
All th elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader must have data cells they describe

8.1.msg: Validateur nu HTML checker accompagné du bookmarklet « Check for WCAG 2.0 parsing compliance » disponible sur la page "about" de cet outil.

8.2.msg: Required ARIA attributes must be provided
Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes
Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children
Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents
Use aria-roledescription on elements with a semantic role
ARIA roles used must conform to valid values
ARIA attributes must conform to valid names
ARIA attributes must conform to valid values
<dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements
<dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>
IDs of active elements must be unique
IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique
<ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements
<li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>
Validateur nu HTML checker accompagné du bookmarklet « Check for WCAG 2.0 parsing compliance » disponible sur la page "about" de cet outil.

8.3.msg: <html> element must have a lang attribute

8.4.msg: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

8.8.msg: lang attribute must have a valid value

9.1.msg: Heading levels should only increase by one

9.2.msg: All page content should be contained by landmarks
Document should not have more than one main landmark

10.8.msg: aria-hidden="true" must not be present on the document body
ARIA hidden element must not contain focusable elements

11.9.msg: Input buttons must have discernible text

12.7.msg: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

13.8.msg: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used
<marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used
